messages.content: You are a helpful assistant.
What are the Great Old Ones compared to in terms of worship?
They are relatively near at hand and occasionally participate in human affairs or contact individual humans, compared to the Outer Gods.
You are a helpful assistant.
How do lone madmen prefer to worship?
They prefer the Outer Gods.
You are a helpful assistant.
Where do beings serving the Great Old Ones typically inhabit?
The remote fastness of the Earth.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the nature of the Great Old Ones in terms of their power and divinity?
They are immensely powerful alien beings with supernatural-seeming abilities, but not true gods in the sense that the Outer Gods are reported.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the status of many Great Old Ones?
Many seem to be temporarily imprisoned in some way.
You are a helpful assistant.
What do beings serving the Great Old Ones often inhabit?
the remote fastness of the Earth
You are a helpful assistant.
What can be said about the Great Old Ones in terms of their power and abilities?
immensely powerful alien beings with supernatural-seeming abilities
You are a helpful assistant.
Are the Great Old Ones considered to be true gods?
no, they are not considered to be true gods
You are a helpful assistant.
Under what conditions do the Great Old Ones seem to be able to move from world to world?
when the stars are right
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the significance of the phrase 'cannot live' in relation to the Great Old Ones?
it means they cannot exist or survive when the stars are not right
You are a helpful assistant.
What is unique about each Great Old One?
They are independent of the rest
You are a helpful assistant.
What condition must be met for Great Old Ones to plunge from world to world?
When the stars are right
You are a helpful assistant.
What does the famous couplet from the Necronomicon suggest about what is not dead?
It can eternal lie
You are a helpful assistant.
Is Cthulhu the most important Great Old One on Earth?
Yes, he is
You are a helpful assistant.
Can minor Great Old Ones be worshiped by humans?
No, usually they have no worshipers
You are a helpful assistant.
Who is worshiped more than the rest put together?
Cthulhu
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the case with minor Great Old Ones?
They usually have no worshipers
You are a helpful assistant.
Can wizards summon minor Great Old Ones?
Yes, wizards may summon them
You are a helpful assistant.
How often do Great Old Ones intervene in human affairs?
They intervene isolatedly
You are a helpful assistant.
How do commentators perceive humanity in relation to Great Old Ones?
They perceive humanity as negligible and unimportant
You are a helpful assistant.
Who are the Great Old Ones mentioned in the text?

The Great Old Ones mentioned in the text are: Atlach-Nacha, Chaugnar Faugn, Cthugha, Cthulhu, Cyaegha, Eihort, Ghatanothoa, Gla'aki, Hastur, Ithaqua, Nyogtha, Quachil Uttaus, Rhan-Tegoth, Shudde M’ell, Tsathoggua, Y’golonac, Yig, Zhar, and Zoth-Ommog.
You are a helpful assistant.
What role do servitor species play in relation to Great Old Ones and Outer Gods?

Servitor species are often associated with particular Great Old Ones or Outer Gods, and they can act as assassins, messengers, spies, and delivery boys, frequently accompanying an Outer God or Great Old One.
You are a helpful assistant.
Who is an example of a servitor species associated with a Great Old One?
Byakhee is an example of a servitor species associated with Hastur.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the general attitude of Great Old Ones towards humanity?
Great Old Ones rarely think about human beings or take them into account, considering humanity to be negligible and unimportant.
You are a helpful assistant.
How do Great Old Ones typically manifest?
Great Old Ones often manifest accompanied by several servitor species, which can frighten off investigators and bulk out confrontations.
